00143 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00144 |   PLT_ProtocolInfo
00145 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00150 class PLT_ProtocolInfo
00151 {
00152 public:
00153     class FieldEntry {
00154     public:
00155         FieldEntry(const char* key, const char* value) :
00156           m_Key(key), m_Value(value) {}
00157         NPT_String m_Key;
00158         NPT_String m_Value;
00159     };
00160 
00161     PLT_ProtocolInfo();
00162     PLT_ProtocolInfo(const char* protocol_info);
00163     PLT_ProtocolInfo(const char* protocol,
00164                      const char* mask,
00165                      const char* content_type,
00166                      const char* extra);
00167     const NPT_String& GetProtocol()     const { return m_Protocol;  }
00168     const NPT_String& GetMask()         const { return m_Mask; }
00169     const NPT_String& GetContentType()  const { return m_ContentType;  }
00170     const NPT_String& GetExtra()        const { return m_Extra; }
00171     const NPT_String& GetDLNA_PN()      const { return m_DLNA_PN; }
00172 
00173     bool IsValid() { return m_Valid; }
00174     NPT_String ToString() const;
00175 
00176     bool Match(const PLT_ProtocolInfo& other) const;
00177 
00178 private:
00179     NPT_Result ValidateField(const char*  val, 
00180                         const char*  valid_chars, 
00181                         NPT_Cardinal num_chars = 0); // 0 means variable number of chars
00182     NPT_Result ParseExtra(NPT_List<FieldEntry>& entries);
00183     NPT_Result ValidateExtra();
00184 
00185 private:
00186     NPT_String           m_Protocol;
00187     NPT_String           m_Mask;
00188     NPT_String           m_ContentType;
00189     NPT_String           m_Extra;
00190     NPT_String           m_DLNA_PN;
00191     NPT_String           m_DLNA_OP;
00192     NPT_String           m_DLNA_PS;
00193     NPT_String           m_DLNA_CI;
00194     NPT_String           m_DLNA_FLAGS;
00195     NPT_String           m_DLNA_MAXSP;
00196     NPT_List<FieldEntry> m_DLNA_OTHER;
00197     bool                 m_Valid;
00198 };

00200 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00201 |   PLT_MediaItemResource
00202 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00203 class PLT_MediaItemResource
00204 {
00205 public:
00206     PLT_MediaItemResource();
00207     ~PLT_MediaItemResource() {}
00208 
00209     NPT_String       m_Uri;
00210     PLT_ProtocolInfo m_ProtocolInfo;
00211     NPT_UInt32       m_Duration; /* seconds */
00212     NPT_LargeSize    m_Size;
00213     NPT_String       m_Protection;
00214     NPT_UInt32       m_Bitrate; /* bytes/seconds */
00215     NPT_UInt32       m_BitsPerSample;
00216     NPT_UInt32       m_SampleFrequency;
00217     NPT_UInt32       m_NbAudioChannels;
00218     NPT_String       m_Resolution;
00219     NPT_UInt32       m_ColorDepth;
00220 };

00222 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00223 |   PLT_MediaObject
00224 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00230 class PLT_MediaObject
00231 {
00232 public:
00233     PLT_MediaObject() {}
00234     virtual ~PLT_MediaObject() {}
00235 
00236     bool IsContainer() { return m_ObjectClass.type.StartsWith("object.container"); }
00237 
00238     static const char* GetMimeType(const NPT_String& filename, 
00239                                    const PLT_HttpRequestContext* context = NULL);
00240     static const char* GetMimeTypeFromExtension(const NPT_String& extension, 
00241                                                 const PLT_HttpRequestContext* context = NULL);
00242     static NPT_String  GetProtocolInfo(const char* filename, 
00243                                        bool with_dlna_extension = true, 
00244                                        const PLT_HttpRequestContext* context = NULL);
00245     static NPT_String  GetMimeTypeFromProtocolInfo(const char* protocol_info);
00246     static const char* GetUPnPClass(const char* filename, 
00247                                     const PLT_HttpRequestContext* context = NULL);
00248     static const char* GetDlnaExtension(const char* mime_type, 
00249                                         const PLT_HttpRequestContext* context = NULL);
00250 
00251     virtual NPT_Result Reset();
00252     virtual NPT_Result ToDidl(NPT_UInt32 mask, NPT_String& didl);
00253     virtual NPT_Result FromDidl(NPT_XmlElementNode* entry);
00254 
00255 public:
00256     /* common properties */
00257     PLT_ObjectClass     m_ObjectClass;
00258     NPT_String          m_ObjectID;
00259     NPT_String          m_ParentID;
00260     NPT_String          m_ReferenceID;
00261 
00262     /* metadata */
00263     NPT_String          m_Title;
00264     NPT_String          m_Creator;
00265     NPT_String          m_Date;
00266     PLT_PeopleInfo      m_People;
00267     PLT_AffiliationInfo m_Affiliation;
00268     PLT_Description     m_Description;
00269     PLT_RecordedInfo    m_Recorded;
00270 
00271     /* properties */
00272     bool m_Restricted;
00273 
00274     /* extras */
00275     PLT_ExtraInfo m_ExtraInfo;
00276 
00277     /* miscellaneous info */
00278     PLT_MiscInfo m_MiscInfo;
00279 
00280     /* resources related */
00281     NPT_Array<PLT_MediaItemResource> m_Resources;
00282 
00283     /* original DIDL for Control Points to pass to a renderer when invoking SetAVTransportURI */
00284     NPT_String m_Didl;    
00285 };
